title: Blanc De Chene (Bikfaya)
summary: Easily accessed via Bekfaya’s main road, Blanc De Chene comfortably accommodates up to 200 guests indoors and 500 outdoors. Upon arrival, their professional valet service will safely park the vehicles in a designated spot, and your guests will then be escorted to an elegantly seated welcome area with live piano …
description:
Easily accessed via Bekfaya’s main road, Blanc De Chene comfortably accommodates up to 200 guests indoors and 500 outdoors. Upon arrival, their professional valet service will safely park the vehicles in a designated spot, and your guests will then be escorted to an elegantly seated welcome area with live piano performance, for them to enjoy their welcome drinks.

All throughout the evening, their tailored and highly amusing musical performances, in addition to their superb catering services will then guarantee that your guests will enjoy a special dinner setting with personalized culinary delights.

With a charming surrounding panoramic view, the enchanting greenery around, the many scenic spots on location, and just the perfect breeze during Lebanon’s summer heat, your dream wedding at Blanc De Chene will certainly be magical.
highlights: Live piano performance (in the welcome drink area)
2 LCD's installed in the Welcome Drink area & a Large LED screen in the ceremony area
Fake cake, real cake, and volcanoes
amenities: Live piano performance (in the welcome drink area)

title: Byblos Sur Mer (Jbeil)
summary: Exquisitely located at the edge of the sea, and at the most prominent spot of Byblos Harbor, Byblos Sur Mer hotel provides privacy and serenity in a truly charming setting and offers its guests the comforts of a home at the heart of a legend. Byblos Sur Mer overlooks the …
description:
Exquisitely located at the edge of the sea, and at the most prominent spot of Byblos Harbor, Byblos Sur Mer hotel provides privacy and serenity in a truly charming setting and offers its guests the comforts of a home at the heart of a legend. Byblos Sur Mer overlooks the ancient Byblos port and castle on one side, and a panoramic view of the Mediterranean sea on the other, in a carefully decorated space furnished with local art and artisanal wares, ancient relics, and precious items from private collections.

There’s no place more perfect to celebrate Love than Byblos, mythical site of the romantic legend of Adonis and Aphrodite.Byblos Sur Mer offers all the makings of a truly romantic and unforgettable wedding with 3 different venues to celebrate your special day.

Services include:
highlights: Fully dedicated team as the hotel undertakes one wedding per night
Complimentary Wedding Coordinator on the wedding day
Lounges for the welcome drink area
Housekeeping team in charge of the wedding area
Discounted prices for hotel accommodation for family and friends
amenities: Fully dedicated team as the hotel undertakes one wedding per night

description:
This is a deluxe indoor and outdoor Venue located on Mastita hill. The resort overlooks the sea giving you a breathtaking view. The Byblos Old Ruins are also nearby and while at it you can chase the sunset and capture unforgettable moments. The excellent architectural and landscaping designs make this hotel the ideal spot for your wedding.

The resort boasts of a garden that can host religious ceremonies, corporate gatherings or weddings. Jardin de Vie also features an elegant ballroom with a capacity of 350 people and more massive garden for up to 900 guests.

title: Le Royal Beirut (Dbayeh)
summary: Whether you have too many ideas to choose from or none at all, our wedding organizers can assist to ensure you have the “just right” wedding you've always wanted! A five-star infrastructure can provide comprehensive original shows, individual never before seen cakes, a poolside sunset theme with a sushi bar, …
description:
Whether you have too many ideas to choose from or none at all, our wedding organizers can assist to ensure you have the “just right” wedding you've always wanted!

A five-star infrastructure can provide comprehensive original shows, individual never before seen cakes, a poolside sunset theme with a sushi bar, a grand ballroom for 500 guests, overhead videos of the couples best moments or even a local Royal Spa honeymoon complete with a mud-bath for two.

Le Royal also specialize in VIP weddings. A few examples include Ajibola Ajimobi, the daughter of Nigerian governors Oya State whom tied the knot in Lebanon, and another was former Miss USA Rima Fakih who wedded music producer Wassim Salibi.

title: Les Grandes Arcades (Bikfaya)
summary: "Les Grandes Arcades" indoor space fits over 200 guests; along with a breathtaking view terrace that can entertain in summer time more than 125 live barbecuing fans. As well as, an outdoor wedding venue that accommodates over 600 persons. The place is a very high end top of the line …
description:
"Les Grandes Arcades" indoor space fits over 200 guests; along with a breathtaking view terrace that can entertain in summer time more than 125 live barbecuing fans. As well as, an outdoor wedding venue that accommodates over 600 persons. The place is a very high end top of the line grand establishment, meeting the unique distinguished standard of both interior context and exterior settings overtaken by well-maintained rich vine yards.

The traditional mountain rustic décor, surrounded by natural sceneries of well-maintained rich vine yards, the wild cocktails enjoyed with refined appetizers of the house, the professional presentation of art healthy meals cooked with organic ingredients and its flavoring taste, and the welcoming staff attitude make it an amazing place for one to enjoy, relax and eat its latest creations of good food.

We combine this creative energy with the classic gastronomic cooking techniques and a sense of global inspiration, while always paying homage to the ingredients themselves.

title: Sawary Resort (Batroun)
summary: At Sawary Beach Resort, you can get all your inspiration for your wedding night come true. Sawary is well designed to host and cater for a wide array of events, such as seated wedding dinners or buffets. Weddings can be held indoor in its restaurant BIHAR or en plein air …
description:
At Sawary Beach Resort, you can get all your inspiration for your wedding night come true. Sawary is well designed to host and cater for a wide array of events, such as seated wedding dinners or buffets. Weddings can be held indoor in its restaurant BIHAR or en plein air in its green garden. Both indoor and outdoor receptions can benefit from the spectacular sea view of the Batroun beach shore.

description:
Swanlake is a naturally wild outdoor wedding and event venue, nestled atop a cliff, among a forest of trees in Mar Moussa, Al Douar. The venue occupies 10,000 sqm of rich greenery, and visitors are greeted by the elegance of its swans and flamingos gliding on our picturesque lake under the silver summer moon.

title: The Legend (Zekrit)
summary: Nested on the bank of the ancient Lycus River (Nahr El Kalb), a two thousand years old historical and archeological site where Emperors and Kings have left their footprints, The Legend Venue is unique by definition. Incense Guests are privileged by an exclusive site seeing view of the Historical Mamluk …
description:
Nested on the bank of the ancient Lycus River (Nahr El Kalb), a two thousand years old historical and archeological site where Emperors and Kings have left their footprints, The Legend Venue is unique by definition. Incense

Guests are privileged by an exclusive site seeing view of the Historical Mamluk Bridge and the 17-Arches Roman Aqueduct, overwhelmed by the sacred beauty of the natural surrounding and swayed by the gentle breeze of the river valley that flows through our venue making it the perfect spot for legendary outdoor and indoor celebrations.

Today, its timeless majesty will enchant and delight, welcoming the most prestigious and glamorous weddings, corporate events and concerts. Our indoor space accommodates up to 1000 persons (seated dinner) and 750 persons (buffet set up) and is operational from 15 October to Mid-May. The outdoor space accommodates up to 1200 persons (seated dinner) and 800 persons (buffet set up) and is operational from 25 May to 1 October.

title: Venezia Gardens (Feytroun)
summary: Would want to choose the best location for your special day? Venezia Gardens offers a mix of grandeur and tranquility. The venue has a 4000m² grounds which can be customized to suit any particular event be it a wedding or a birthday celebration. The place is sure to fascinate even …
description:
Would want to choose the best location for your special day? Venezia Gardens offers a mix of grandeur and tranquility. The venue has a 4000m² grounds which can be customized to suit any particular event be it a wedding or a birthday celebration. The place is sure to fascinate even the most sophisticated clientele. In addition to its unmatched facilities, the hotel is conveniently located along the Faytroun-Lebanon Highway and just about 30-km from Beirut. Standing at a 1200m altitude, Venezia is the ideal location for those looking to make enduring memories.

title: Waves Aqua Park & Resort (Dbayeh)
summary: Waves is the biggest Aqua Park in Lebanon and one of the biggest in the Middle East covering an area of 60,000 sqm. Situated on a pine-forested hill overseeing Beirut, Waves is an ideal summer destination for everyone seeking both fun and leisure.
description:
Waves is the biggest Aqua Park in Lebanon and one of the biggest in the Middle East covering an area of 60,000 sqm. Situated on a pine-forested hill overseeing Beirut, Waves is an ideal summer destination for everyone seeking both fun and leisure .

title: La Maison de la Forêt
summary: Eco forest escape perched above Bkassine’s pines with wooden decks, cabins, and sunset views.
description:
La Maison de la Forêt sits in the heart of Bkassine’s pine forest near Jezzine, pairing wooden decks, cabins, and a panoramic lawn under the trees. Guests arrive to fresh mountain air and forest scents, with sunset views stretching across the valley.

Timber paths connect the main deck, a flexible reception lawn, and cabin clusters ideal for preparations or overnights. Evening lighting glows softly through the pines, and the on-site team can arrange casual picnics or more formal seated dinners with local, seasonal menus.

Perfect for nature-forward weddings, retreats, and celebrations where the forest is the star backdrop.

title: Taanayel Ecolodge
summary: Adobe lodges, lakeside lawns, and arcenciel hospitality in the heart of the Bekaa.
description:
Taanayel Ecolodge pairs adobe-style guesthouses with a reflective lake, orchards, and wide lawns for sunset ceremonies. The arcenciel team handles on-site hospitality, giving couples a slow-living retreat that keeps guests close to nature without sacrificing comfort.

Lakeside decks work for both ceremonies and receptions, while the ecolodge rooms give wedding parties and family a place to prep and stay overnight. Lighting, power backup, and valet support keep logistics smooth even for larger celebrations.
highlights: Adobe-style ecolodges for prep and overnights
